title: Peaceful Morning On The Homestead & Moving The Hogs | Farm Vlog

tasks.task: Feed and interact with farm animals.
subtasks: Approach the pig and attempt to lift it.
Encourage the pig to enter a designated area.
Handle the sheep and guide them to join the other animals.
Check the compost area and ensure all animals are together.
Monitor the animals' reactions and behavior.
Assist in transferring compost or food for the animals.
